name: Menu Icons Improved - Fx 4+
description:
For Firefox 4+ and latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds.

For my own personal use. Modified version of style 40211, with additional add-on compatibility fixes for "[Ext]Extension Option Menu", "[Ext]Personal Menu", "[Ext]Tab Groups Menu", "[Ext]Dom Inspector", "[Ext]Inspect Context", "[Ext]Tab Mix Plus" and the New Inspector Element(Q) menu-item.

Credit for code goes to user 6717.

Tested on Firefox 4+ and up to the latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, Nightly builds.

To customize or fix Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds, you can also have a look at my other styles: user 61655
